content.heading: <pre> Tag
paragraphs:
Example: 
Text    with spaces
and line breaks

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Displays text in a fixed-width font, preserving spaces and line breaks.

content.heading: Examples
paragraphs:
Fixed width: 
Fixed width pre text

content.heading: Default CSS
paragraphs: pre { display: block; font-family: monospace; white-space: pre; margin: 1em 0; }
